docs.text: Breaker Panel Labels Make an easy to read label for your circuit breaker panel Example output Inputs Create a csv file using this format. Separate the circuits cell with ; to list multiple items. number amp circuits panel room floor 1 30 water heater subpanel basement basement 7 15 master bed room lights; master bed room plugs; Master bath lights subpanel master bed 2nd Text block version of the above number,amp,circuits,panel,room,floor 1,30,water heater,subpanel,basement,basement, 7,15,master bed room lights; master bed room plugs; Master bath lights,subpanel,master bed,2nd
docs.title: Breaker Panel Labels

docs.text: Command Line Interface cli Make color coded breaker panel label Args: csv_file (str): file with panel info.
